name: War.io Tanks !
description:
War io Tanks !

You start with a small tank and you grow stronger as you level up.
Drive around and farm to gain experience and level up! It's easy to lose control and die so be alert!
Upgrade your tank based on the strategy you choose! Choose a smart strategy in order not to die.

Move around and search for the weak opponents and the victory will be yours!
Kill your opponents and try not to die!
Improve your io skills and try to survive!

Don't die for a long time and climb as high as you can in the live leaderboard!

Do you need a fast game with multiple strategies to chose? Then this is the game for you! Try it out!

** The online multiplayer feature is under development so server lag and disconnections may occur!
Thank you for your support!

Features:

- Upgrade your tank to level 70.
- Many different kinds of tanks, more to come.
- No need to be online.
- No Lag. Smooth gameplay for any devices.
- Online leaderboard.
